org.springframework.social.evernote.api

Interface LinkedNoteStoreOperations

  • All Superinterfaces:
    StoreOperations
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BusinessNoteStoreOperations

    public interface LinkedNoteStoreOperations
extends StoreOperations
    Interface specifying a set of LinkedNoteStoreClient operations.
    Author:
    Tadaya Tsuyukubo
